content: * please note that this listing is for the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find a free version of this pattern at theturtletrunk com and on the turtle trunk youtube channel * the picot bandana crochet pattern features lots of beautiful texture that s easy to create it includes 3 sizes so you can make one for anyone and it s the perfect warm weather accessory to protect your head from the sun keep your hair back or just to look cute difficulty best suited for an advanced beginner or higher sizes included small 14 x 7 medium 17 x 9 large 20 x 11 supplies needed 60-135 yards of medium 4 weight yarn 5 00mm h crochet hook yarn needle and scissors pattern includes - gauge pattern - reference photos - special stitch instructions - link to free + full video tutorial - detailed instructions for 3 sizes you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
